About.title: About Me
About.description: I'm Abdullah Omar - a photographer and creative producer passionate about capturing visuals that tell stories and reflect true identity.
About.quote: Every shot I take is crafted with precision, emotion, and a clear artistic vision.

Testimonials.title: Client Reviews
Testimonials.subtitle: What my clients say about their experience with me

testimonial1.content: Amazing experience with Abdullah, the photography was very professional and the results exceeded expectations. I recommend everyone to work with him.
testimonial1.name: Mohammed Al-Otaibi

testimonial2.content: Professional and creative photographer, understands the vision quickly and executes it perfectly. Photo quality and production are excellent.
testimonial2.name: Sarah Ahmed

testimonial3.content: Our wedding photos were more than amazing, captured all the special moments in a beautiful artistic way. Thank you Abdullah!
testimonial3.name: Khaled & Fatima
